note: I followed the cool kids here because they make me laugh. Look! There goes one now! After 18 years in Education, I developed a crisis of faith in the system, so I left. I went from being a high school assistant principal to being a legal writer; it was a scary. So far, I’ve loved every minute of starting over.  ADHD is my superpower. Music is my salve. Books are my escape. Travel is my stimulant. Family is my touchstone. Love is everything.
